jcr:content.jcr:description: adaptTo() 2023 … 12th edition of Europe's leading developer conference for Adobe Experience Manager (AEM) … 25th - 27th September

text.text:
Thank You for a Successful Event!

After last year's break, adaptTo() 2023 has concluded. The event was a tremendous success, and we want to express our gratitude to all the participants, speakers, sponsors, and volunteers who made it possible.

What's Next? Recorded Talks: If you missed any sessions or want to revisit the highlights, the recorded talks from adaptTo() 2023 are now available online. Dive back into the wealth of AEM knowledge shared during the event. Stay Connected: Although adaptTo() 2023 has ended, our commitment to the AEM community continues. Stay connected with us on our [social media profiles] and subscribe to our newsletter to receive updates on future events and community activities.

What’s next?

Recorded Talks

If you missed any sessions or want to revisit the highlights, the recorded talks from adaptTo() 2023 are now available online. Dive back into the wealth of AEM knowledge shared during the event.

Stay connected

Although adaptTo() 2023 has ended, our commitment to the AEM community continues. Stay connected with us on our LinkedIn & Twitter and subscribe to our newsletter to receive updates on future events and community activities.

Mark your calendars

2024 adaptTo() will be back! Make sure to mark your calendar and look out for the announcement of the date. Call for Papers and the Ticketshop will open in Spring 2024.

Information in a Nutshell

When and where?

25th-27th September 2023 at KulturBrauerei in Berlin

For whom?

  • AEM developers
  • AEC experts
  • Apache Sling, Jackrabbit, Felix and wcm.io enthusiasts
  • frontend and backend developers
  • systems architects
  • AEM and AEC newbies with profound technical knowledge

What can you expect?

  • 3 full days, packed with expert knowledge
  • inspirational talks by brilliant minds
  • 200 passionate attendees from all over Europe and the world
  • well-organized event as well as competent support before and during the event
  • a safe place to learn from the best, share ideas and get connected beyond the event
  • an open-minded OSS community

What about the tickets?

Tickets are available here.

If you don’t want to miss out on our Early Bird Tickets Sale, make sure to sign up for our adaptTo() newsletter.

Still not convinced? No problem at all. Click here to learn more about the conference in more detail and to see impressions from the past years.

text_662337239.text:
Looking back: adaptTo() 2019-2021

All talks of recent adaptTo() conferences are published on our channel on Youtube (and linked in the schedule pages: 2019, 2020 and 2021).
You will find all pictures in our image galleries 2019, 2020 and 2021 - check it out.
